channel.title: A big problem for me server
channel.description:
i got this in me RUNNING: E xception encountered while parsing incoming packets from King of str. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:18219) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:272) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)
The people lose all the items (PLAYER RESET) any know how to fix? THANX. :D

item.title: A big problem for me server
item.dc:creator: @Editt Editt
item.description:
@Editt wrote:

i got this in me RUNNING:
E
xception encountered while parsing incoming packets from King of str.
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:129)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:182)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:18219)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:272)
at process.run(process.java:23)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

The people lose all the items (PLAYER RESET) any know how to fix?
THANX.
